content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. I can help get your plumbing issue scheduled. May I have your name, please?
Thank you, Linda. Could you please provide your address, so we can confirm you’re in our service area?
Thank you! Can you tell me a bit about the plumbing issue you’re having?
My kitchen sink is backed up! I’ve tried everything. And I need this fixed soon, but I don’t want to pay a fortune.
I understand how frustrating that can be. I’ll do my best to help you quickly and affordably. Do you have a preferred date or time for an appointment?
I just want it done as soon as possible. What’ll this cost? Can someone come today or tomorrow?
I’ll check our next available times for you. For price: most drain cleanings start at $95, but the tech can give a full estimate on site before any work starts. Would you like to proceed?
Fine. If it can be under $100, schedule it. Otherwise, never mind.
Thank you, Linda. Let me check our soonest available appointments for you right now.
We have an opening today at 6:30 pm, or tomorrow at 10:00 am or 2:00 pm. Which time works best for you?
I guess tomorrow at 10 is fine. Just please don’t let the price go higher.
You’re scheduled for tomorrow at 10:00 am. The technician will confirm the price before starting any work. Would you like a reminder text before the appointment?
